animals Amy Adams plays a successful art
gallery owner who becomes engrossed in a
book dedicated to her and written by her
ex-husband in her review Manohla Dargis
rights nocturnal animals is a harsh
cautionary tale about love vengeance and
the divide between life and art that
shadowy in-between space in which real
people are turned into fictional
characters and old hurts made into
narrative Grist there's much to admire

like the work of an observant student
